amendment.description: To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 28 pursuant to the order of 2/2/2011, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes for the adoption of the amendment, withdrawn in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 28 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 7.

action.text: Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S472-474; text: CR S472-473) To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Levin.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 28 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 7.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 28 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 7.
